parse.title: List of schools of international relations

text.*:
This is a list of schools with dedicated or teaching programs in international relations.

This is a dynamic list and may never be able to satisfy particular standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it with reliably sourced entries.

Africa[edit]

Cameroon[edit]

  • University of Yaoundé: International Relations Institute of Cameroon[1] located in Yaoundé
  • University of Yaounde 2 : International relations and strategic studies

Egypt[edit]

  • Cairo University: Faculty of Economics and Political Science[2] located in Giza
  • Mansoura University:[3] located in Mansoura
  • American University in Cairo: Political Science Department and the School of Global Affairs and Public Policy[4] located in Cairo
  • Helwan University: Faculty of Commerce and Business Administration Department of International Relations[5] located in Cairo
  • Pharos University in Alexandria: Faculty of Legal Studies and International Relations[6] ions located in Alexandria
  • British University in Cairo: Political Science Department located in Cairo
  • Future University: Political Science Department located in Cairo

Ghana[edit]

  • Ridgeway School of Diplomacy: located in Accra Ghana.
  • University of Ghana: Legon Center for International Affairs and Diplomacy[7] located in Accra

Kenya[edit]

  • United States International University: school of humanities and social sciences, Bachelor of Arts in international relations[8]
  • University of Nairobi: Institute of Diplomacy and International Studies[9] located in Nairobi

Liberia[edit]

  • University of Liberia: Ibrahim B. Babangida Graduate School of International Relations[10] located in Monrovia

Morocco[edit]

  • Al Akhawayn University: School of Humanities and Social Sciences[11] located in Ifrane

  • Higher Institute of International Relations: Located in Maputo, www.isri.co.mz
